name: HELIX Metaverse
introduce: HELIX(Hyper Expansive Lifelike Interoperable eXperience) is a high- fidelity metaverse platform centered around the concept of true digital ownership and independent player economy. Immerse in Parallel City,a meticulously detailed 1:1 scale recreation of New York City where users can explore freelyown land meet new friends, play games, and earn tokens. HELIX Metaverse is built by Hypersonic Laboratories.
